resources.string: The institute was established in 2003 by Jagannath Gupta Memorial Education Society which has been an academic leader for over 20 years with 8 higher educational institutes of academic excellence in Delhi/NCR and 3 in Rajasthan, one of which, Jagannath University has been established through an Act of Rajasthan Assembly as a private university at Jaipur, and yet another private state university by the same name at Bahadurgarh, Haryana, the Jagannath Gupta Memorial Educational Society has been blazing a trail in higher and professional education.
